00029 
00030 #ifndef HARPS_OUTPUT_WAVE
00031 #define HARPS_OUTPUT_WAVE
00032 
00033 #include <harps/config.hpp>
00034 #include <harps/exceptions.hpp>
00035 
00036 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00037 #include <boost/filesystem/path.hpp>
00038 #include <boost/filesystem/operations.hpp>
00039 
00040 #include <fstream>
00041 
00042 namespace harps {
00043   namespace output {
00047     template< bool is_stereo, unsigned int bytes_per_sample >
00048       class Wave {
00049         public:
00054           Wave( const char *_filename )
00055           : filepath( _filename, boost::filesystem::native ), outfile( new std::fstream( _filename, std::ios::out ) ) {
00056             if( outfile->fail() )
00057               throw UnableToOpenSink();
00058             static const char header[] = {
00059               'R', 'I', 'F', 'F',
00060               0xF8, 0xFF, 0x3F, 0x00,
00061               'W', 'A','V','E',
00062               'f', 'm', 't', ' ',
00063               0x10, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,
00064               0x01, 0x00
00065             };
00066             outfile->write ( header, 22 );
00067             static const unsigned int channels = ( ( is_stereo ) ? 2 : 1 );
00068             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( channels ) );
00069             outfile->put ( 0x00 );
00070             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( SAMPLING_RATE ) );
00071             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( SAMPLING_RATE >> 8 ) );
00072             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( SAMPLING_RATE >> 16 ) );
00073             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( SAMPLING_RATE >> 24 ) );
00074             static const unsigned int byte_per_sec = SAMPLING_RATE * channels * bytes_per_sample;
00075             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( byte_per_sec ) );
00076             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( byte_per_sec >> 8 ) );
00077             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( byte_per_sec >> 16 ) );
00078             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( byte_per_sec >> 24 ) );
00079             static const unsigned int sample_size = bytes_per_sample * channels;
00080             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( sample_size ) );
00081             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( sample_size >> 8 ) );
00082             static const unsigned int bits_per_sample = bytes_per_sample * 8;
00083             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( bits_per_sample ) );
00084             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( bits_per_sample >> 8 ) );
00085             static const char footer[] = {
00086               'd', 'a', 't', 'a',
00087               0xD4, 0xFF, 0x3F, 0x00,
00088             };
00089             outfile->write ( footer, 8 );
00090           }
00094           virtual ~Wave() {
00095             const unsigned int filesize = boost::filesystem::file_size( filepath );
00096             outfile->seekp ( 4, std::ios_base::beg );
00097             const unsigned int riff_size = filesize - 8;
00098             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( riff_size ) );
00099             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( riff_size >> 8 ) );
00100             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( riff_size >> 16 ) );
00101             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( riff_size >> 24 ) );
00102             outfile->seekp ( 40, std::ios_base::beg );
00103             const unsigned int data_size = filesize - 44;
00104             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( data_size ) );
00105             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( data_size >> 8 ) );
00106             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( data_size >> 16 ) );
00107             outfile->put ( static_cast< char >( data_size >> 24 ) );
00108           }
00113           template< typename SampleType >
00114             void operator()( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer ) {
00115               int index;
00116               typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *left_raw_buffer = _buffer.getLeft();
00117               typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *right_raw_buffer = _buffer.getRight();
00118               for( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ ) {
00119                 writeValue( left_raw_buffer[ index ] );
00120                 if( is_stereo )
00121                   writeValue( right_raw_buffer[ index ] );
00122               }
00123             }
00124         private:
00125           void writeValue( float _value ) {
00126             if( bytes_per_sample == 1 ) {
00127               int8_t int_value = _value * 127;
00128               outfile->put( int_value );
00129             }
00130             else if( bytes_per_sample == 2 ) {
00131               int16_t int_value = _value * ( 32767 - 4096 );
00132               outfile->put( static_cast< char >( int_value ) );
00133               outfile->put( static_cast< char >( int_value >> 8 ) );
00134             }
00135           }
00136           boost::filesystem::path filepath;
00137           boost::shared_ptr< std::fstream > outfile;
00138       };
00139   }
00140 }
00141 
00142 #endif
